data.price: Isin Yaa namootaa! Nuti dhiiraafi dubartii irraa isin uumne, sabootaafi gosoota isin taasifne akka wal beektaniif jecha. Rabbiin biratti irra kabajamaan keessan, irra Rabbiin sodaataa keessani. Rabbiin beekaa keessa hubataadha.
data.arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرٖ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ شُعُوبٗا وَقَبَآئِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ أَكۡرَمَكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتۡقَىٰكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٞ

dua.name: Dua for Cultural Understanding
dua.significanceReason: Encourages mutual understanding, respect, and appreciation of diverse human cultures and backgrounds.
